name: Bash 'em up
description:
BASH 'EM UP!

A Shoot 'em up where you can't shoot! 
Will only take a minute to play.  ;)

Controls:
MOVE:  Arrow keys
SHOOT:  C
BOOST:  X

Made in 48 for the 2018 GMTK Game jam, with the theme "Genre without mechanics."

Made by Jan-Sebastian Uruba in PICO-8 (https://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php)
Code snippet for the textboxes by Oli414 (https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=28465)

Thanks for playing!
